question: 寝る
sourceAnswer: to: sleep-(lying-down) | go-to-bed/lie-in-bed | lie-down | sleep-(with-someone,-i.e.-have-intercourse) | lie-flat-(e.g.-of-hair) | lie-idle-(of-funds,-stock,-etc.) | ferment-(of-soy-sauce,-miso,-etc.)
userAnswer: to: lie-{sleeping | down-(in-bed) | flat | idle | fermenting) | have-sex
activeAnswer: to: lie-{sleeping | down-(in-bed) | flat | idle | fermenting) | have-sex
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>lie down</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to lie down</vocabulary>, but what you're really doing is trying <vocabulary>to sleep</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the reading you learned with the kanji. So, you can go ahead and lie down for a moment before moving on to the next item.
